Work with Our Experts

With over 15 years of industry experience, our staff is here to support a wide range of projects, from academic proof-of-concept scale-ups to production demonstrations for startups.

Our Commitment

Consultative Approach

Innovative

We like to try new things but your IP always remains yours.

Fermentation capacity
Mini benchtop : 0.2 L (×8) (coming in Spring 2025)
Small benchtop : 3 L (×4), 5 L, 15 L (×2), 20 L (×2)
Steam-in-place : 10 L, 100 L, 200 L (coming before 2026)
Downstream Processing
Continuous centrifugation (coming soon), tangential flow filtration, spray drying, lyophilization
Monitoring & Analysis
Biomass analysis, cell imaging, sugar & metabolite profiling, protein quantification
Organisms we have worked with
Bacteria, budding yeasts, methylotrophic yeasts, fungi
Products we have experience with
Biopolymers, biofertilizers, biopesticides, biofuels, probiotics, recombinant proteins, Insulin, enzymes, acids, plasmid DNA, biological controls
Modes and Control
Run in batch, fed-batch, or continuous mode
Control by dissolved oxygen, pH, temperature, off-gas
